title: Mañana Es Primavera
overview: Mañana Es Primavera (Tomorrow is Spring) is a Mexican telenovela produced by Silvia Pinal for Televisa in 1982. It starred by Silvia Pinal, Gustavo Rojo, Viridiana Alatriste and Ofelia Guilmáin. Amanda is a middle-aged woman from a wealthy family who is forced to rebuild her life after leaving her husband Alfredo for a younger woman, Alicia, who only seeks money. Amanda, in an attempt to overcome her sadness, goes to a psychoanalyst, during this process he meets Rodrigo, a young idealist artist who is in love with her. However, when she discovers her lover's true intentions, Alfred separates her from her and tries to conquer Amanda again.
